content: Mary mi ha detto che stava bene.
translations: eng:Mary told me she was OK
eng:Mary told me she was fine
eng:Mary told me she was well
eng:Mary told me that she was OK
eng:Mary told me that she was fine
eng:Mary told me that she was well
